pros: I have worked for Hunterdon Healthcare System for the past 30 years. I started when I was in High School in the Nutrition Department and worked while in college and came back to work in the field I studied. I have always felt that the organization listens to employees' concerns and reacts to support the needs of the community. People are friendly, care for one another and work as a team. I love coming to work each day because of the work we do and the people I get to work with.

pros: People there were great. The facility is up to date and lovely.  I was a Float CNA so I saw the entire hospital. It was a great place to work, truly.  They are always offering you to new positions and giving you free training.
cons: It was too far for me to commute. If you live in the area its got to be a great place to work.

review_title: There's a reason I've stayed this long (12+ years).
pros: Competitive wages, better benefits than most, excellent paid time off benefits.  Managers look out for their staff, work with staff to better meet staff's personal needs.
cons: It's the healthcare industry, and it's a hard industry to be in these days.  Staffing is tight, and the work is demanding.

pros: I have made some good friends @ work

review_title: Great place to work and grow
